message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1500000. It's a unique opportunity, and I believe it will be a valuable asset to you. Let me know what you think!
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $1500000 is a bit out of my budget. I'm interested in your product but I'd be willing to pay $1100000. Let me know what you think.
Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $1100000 is below my minimum, I'm willing to compromise. How about we meet in the middle at $1300000?  This would still be a good deal for both of us.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1300000 is still a bit high for me. I'm happy to meet you halfway between our last two offers. Would you consider $1200000? This is the absolute maximum I'm able to pay.
